origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SocialSecurityAPI.get_public_service_platform_features', 'description': 'This function provides the features of the social insurance public service platform for the latest or specified version.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of social insurance platform, e.g., social_insurance.'}, {'name': 'version', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The version of the platform for which features are requested. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'platformFeatures', 'description': 'Features of the specified social insurance public service platform version.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SocialSecurityAPI.get_public_service_platform_features, 它的参数输入如下: 'platform'是'social_insurance', 'version'是'latest'.
